description: [NKAbuse](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1107) conducts multiple system checks and includes these in subsequent "heartbeat" messages to the malware's command and control server.(Citation: NKAbuse SL)

external_references.description: KASPERSKY GERT. (2023, December 14). Unveiling NKAbuse: a new multiplatform threat abusing the NKN protocol. Retrieved February 8, 2024.
